channel.title: Newsletters on Montessori Bloom
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletters on Montessori Bloom

item.description: August Newsletter Room 302 Monday, August 27, 2018 Dear Parents, Welcome back to school! Thank you very much for coming to our Open House and /or Back to School Night last week. It was great to meet and see you all. I am looking forward to working with you this year. Following are a list of things I spoke about at our Back to School Night: About Me (Please find this on my website at montessoribloom.
